--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Cerberus::
> 
>     "Let me return to Zardus," He said to the bot that was leading 
him. "And then tell Magmatron that we will be alling ourselves with 
the Alliance."
